properties.areaDesc: West Elk and Sawatch Mountains; Gore and Elk Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 5 at 2:19AM MST until February 7 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Grand Junction CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 18
inches with locally higher amounts up to 2 feet. Winds gusting
as high as 40 mph.

* WHERE...Gore and Elk Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys and
West Elk and Sawatch Mountains.

* WHEN...From 5 AM Thursday to 8 PM MST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible at times,
especially on mountain passes. Patchy blowing snow could
significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as
20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little
as 30 minutes. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at:
www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM THURSDAY TO 8 PM MST FRIDAY
